const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "index",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      normalizer: {
        my_normalizer: {
          type: "custom",
          char_filter: [],
          filter: ["lowercase", "asciifolding"],
        },
      },
    },
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      foo: {
        type: "keyword",
        normalizer: "my_normalizer",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

  index: "index",

    term: {

});

  index: "index",

});
